# NSWindow.SelectionDirection.directSelection

**Case**

The window isn’t traversing the key view loop.

## Declaration

```swift
case directSelection
```

## Constants

- **NSWindow.SelectionDirection.selectingNext**: The window is proceeding to the next valid key view.
- **NSWindow.SelectionDirection.selectingPrevious**: The window is proceeding to the previous valid key view.

items.description: The window is proceeding to the next valid key view.
items.name: NSWindow.SelectionDirection.selectingNext

items.description: The window is proceeding to the previous valid key view.
items.name: NSWindow.SelectionDirection.selectingPrevious

title: NSWindow.SelectionDirection.directSelection
